sql:execute-query.sql:query: select distinct bib_mfhd.mfhd_id, bib_mfhd.bib_id from lmldb.mfhd_master, lmldb.bib_master, lmldb.bib_mfhd, lmldb.bib_index where bib_index.bib_id = bib_mfhd.bib_id and bib_master.bib_id = bib_mfhd.bib_id and mfhd_master.mfhd_id = bib_mfhd.mfhd_id and bib_index.index_code = '655H' and (bib_index.normal_heading = 'CALCULATORS CLINICAL' or bib_index.normal_heading = 'ALGORITHMS' or bib_index.normal_heading = 'DECISION SUPPORT TECHNIQUES') and mfhd_master.location_id > 69 and mfhd_master.location_id < 71 and mfhd_master.suppress_in_opac != 'Y' and bib_master.suppress_in_opac != 'Y'
